remarks: Membership in the kernel of a functional.  ( ~ elnlfn analog.) (Contributed by NM, 16-Apr-2014.)
statement:
lkrfval2.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lkrfval2.d $e |- D = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
lkrfval2.o $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` D ) $.
lkrfval2.f $e |- F = ( LFnl ` W ) $.
lkrfval2.k $e |- K = ( LKer ` W ) $.
ellkr $p |- ( ( W e. Y /\ G e. F ) -> ( X e. ( K ` G ) <-> ( X e. V /\ ( G ` X ) = .0. ) ) ) $.
